comments.body: Creating an underlying RingBuffer can take quite a few cycles. Might be interesting to move queue creation into a setup method at the Trial level. Since offer + take leave the queue empty at the end of benchmark method invocation, we can collect a more precise performance measurement. Same applies to `QueueParallelBenchmark`.
